title: These are the highest-paying design jobs in 2022
content:
Design is absolutely everywhere from the clothes we wear to the websites we use, and from the magazines we read to the desks that we sit at everyday. The design industry really is like no other. Designers not only get the chance to be creative and innovative every single day, they also have the opportunity to completely shape the world we live in. ​​One of the main things that attracts people to this sector is the fact that it’s constantly evolving and redefining itself. Not only are we continuously seeing shifts in style, but also in terms of medium and…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: If you're a designer, these are the top jobs in terms of salary in 2022 according to Indeed's salary calculator.
